node.detail_zh: 患者屬「酒吧及樂隊」群組，有長期病患，無外遊記錄。 3 月 24 日出現發燒、咳嗽及呼吸困難症狀。
node.detail_en: The patient belongs to 'Bar & Band' Cluster. The patient started having symptoms of fever, cough and shortness of breath since Mar 24.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者
node.group_description_zh: 牽涉酒吧包括位於蘭桂坊的 Insomnia、尖沙咀的 All Night Long、灣仔的 Dusk till Dawn 及 Centre Stage。當中41人為樂隊成員及酒吧職員，31人是酒吧顧客，26人為第二代感染，4人為第三代感染，1人為第四代感染。
node.group_description_en: This cluster involves Lan Kwai Fong's Insomnia, Knustford Terrance's All Night Long, and Centre Stage & Dusk Till Dawn in Wan Chai.  Among patients, 41 were band members and bar staff, 31 were bar customers, 26 were second-generation infections, 4 were third-generation infections, and 1 was fourth-generation infection.

node.remarks_zh: 3 月 24 日出現發燒、咳嗽及呼吸困難症狀
node.remarks_en: Developed fever, cough and shortness of breath since Mar 24

node.location_zh: 諾士佛臺 9 號 All Night Long 酒吧
node.remarks_zh: 曾於潛伏期光顧，到訪日期有待確定
node.remarks_en: Visited the bar during incubation period where exact visit date(s) to be confirmed
